channel.title: Purbanchal Directory - Recently Added Listings - Movies

item.title: CineFlix
item.description: CineFlix is situated at Itahari, Sunsari. We are proud to be a part in the entertainment business for the local people at Sunsari.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Central Multiplex
item.description: With the launch of Central Multiplex, we have added a new name to the list of movie destinations in Biratnagar. This multiplex is the first standard multiplex from Central Multiplex. Central Multiplex Pvt. Ltd. Main Road, Biratnagar -7, Nepal info@centralmultiplex.com.np 021-534008, 021-534009
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: City Cinema
item.description: City Cinemas offer the best in comfort and viewing. The lobby food court and main concession stands offers a wide variety of movie fare For Advanced Booking Please Call +977 021522200 / 522003
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Nilkantha Cinema
item.description: Nilkantha Cinema is situated at Damak, Jhapa. We are proud to be a part in the entertainment business for the local people at Jhapa.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Himalaya Cinema Hall
item.description: Himalaya Talkies is situated at the Mahendra chowk which is the heart of the Biratnagar. It is one of the oldest Cinema Hall of the City. The Cinema has its own carishma and charm for the people of Biratnagar and people nearby. The cinema hall is the first Digital Hall in the Purbanchal region. The standard it has set is one of its kind. Please log into www.purbanchaldirectory.com and get the updates about running movies and upcoming movies. Stay Tuned for the ticket prices and the show times. Himalaya Cinema Hall Biratnagar, Nepal. The ticket prices has been updated again. Please call us for confirmation. we have lunched our official website. http://himalayatalkies.com.np/
item.dc:creator: superadmin
